alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 5:26PM EDT until July 06 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Powell County in east central Kentucky... Estill County in east central Kentucky... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 526 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hardwick, or near Irvine, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cottage Furnace around 535 PM EDT. Fitchburg around 540 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
